subject: Junit Report and Log4j
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using junit report to get a good html view of the reports. At the same time I have intiliazed log4j to log on some details about the tests. But all
messageBody:
Hi,

I am using junit report to get a good html view of the reports. At the
same time I have intiliazed log4j to log on some details about the
tests.

But all the log4j statements are not getting written into the file
which has been configured to be used form the log4j properties files.
The messages get logged into the report html page as System.err...html
page. Is something wrong in my settings ?


Thanks
Shobhana
